meanings.sent1: She replicated the painting by carefully copying every detail.
meanings.sent2: The scientist replicated the experiment to confirm the results.
meanings.sent3: He replicated her dance moves at the party, much to everyone's amusement.
meanings.sent4: The artist's style was so unique that it could not be replicated by anyone else.
meanings.sent5: The student's handwriting was so neat that it almost looked replicated by a machine.

meanings.definition: Made or done in the same way as something else.
meanings.sent1: The store sold replicated designer bags that looked just like the originals.
meanings.sent2: The replicated documents were indistinguishable from the originals.
meanings.sent3: The replicated cake tasted just as good as the original one.
meanings.sent4: Her replicated outfit was a perfect match to her friend's.
meanings.sent5: The replicated pattern on the fabric was flawless and identical.

meanings.sent1: He replicated his success by following the same strategy.
meanings.sent2: The machine can quickly replicate multiple copies of the same document.
meanings.sent3: She replicated her friend's funny joke to make everyone laugh again.
meanings.sent4: The team's unity replicated the strength of a tightly woven fabric.
meanings.sent5: The artist's ability to replicate nature's beauty on canvas was truly remarkable.
